scripts.db:pull: cd apps/backend && pnpm exec supabase db pull
scripts.db:push: cd apps/backend && pnpm exec supabase db push
scripts.db:diff: cd apps/backend && pnpm exec supabase db diff
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && pnpm exec supabase db reset
scripts.db:status: cd apps/backend && pnpm exec supabase status
scripts.gen:types: supabase gen types typescript --project-id oqmllypaarqvabuvbqga --schema public,auth,storage > apps/frontend/src/types/database.types.ts
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000 && echo '✅ Frontend OK' || echo '❌ Frontend KO'
scripts.health:backend: curl -f http://localhost:3001/health && echo '✅ Backend OK' || echo '❌ Backend KO'
scripts.build: pnpm build:packages && cd apps/frontend && pnpm build
scripts.build:backend: pnpm build:packages && cd apps/backend && pnpm build
scripts.clean:cache: pnpm store prune && npm cache clean --force
scripts.sync:full: pnpm db:pull && pnpm gen:types && pnpm typecheck
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd apps/frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.setup: pnpm install:all && pnpm validate:env && pnpm test:supabase
